room_title: Escape room "The Warrior's Way" by Red Door Escape Room in Oklahoma City
room_description: You’ve seen movies about the famous martial arts sensei - from The Karate Kid to Kung Fu Panda - and now it’s time to live the story! Warriors Way brings your team from the tranquil meditation gardens to the hard-worn Aikido mat as you work together to impress the legendary master. You’ve been searching for years to find his hidden dojo and you’re not about to let this moment slip away without leaving a good impression. Your team will need to be quick on your feet as you work to complete his test in under 60 minutes with hopes to earn your way into his inner circle. Warriors Way requires excellent communication as your group starts in different parts of the meditation garden and needs to unite in order to complete the episode. Perfect for groups with a variety of talents, Warriors Way will test all of your senses before you are deemed worthy of success!
